snippet.title: GIF: Columbus Crew defender Gonzalez guilty of play-acting
snippet.description: The San Jose Earthquakes and the Columbus Crew drew 1-1 in Major League Soccer on Sunday, but the game all but ended on a sour note when, in the closing few minutes, Columbus defender Giancarlo Gonzalez stooped to produce a piece of truly abysmal pla...

snippet.description: It's safe to say that Saturday was full of mixed emotions for Jurgen Klinsmann. The U.S. coach was in attendance for an evening match between the Galaxy and Vancouver Whitecaps at StubHub Center just outside of Los Angeles, where he watched World Cup...

snippet.title: San Jose draw with Columbus
snippet.description: #INSERT type:video END# SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- Chris Wondolowski scored on a header in the 51st minute to help the San Jose Earthquakes tie the Columbus Crew 1-1 on Sunday. Wondolowski has three goals this season for San Jose (0-2-2). Federico Hig...

snippet.title: Nguyen's late goal gives Revs first win
snippet.description: The comeback kids took center stage on Saturday. But it wasn't the Earthquakes who came out on top at Buck Shaw Stadium. Lee Nguyen's stoppage-time strike delivered a late dagger to the hosts, who entered Saturday's match with 17 stoppage-time goa...

snippet.title: Revs beat Quakes in 93rd minute
snippet.description: Lee Nguyen scored in the 93rd minute, and the New England Revolution beat the San Jose Earthquakes 2-1 on Saturday night for their first win of the season.
